channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Windows 11 : la grosse mise à jour de février est imminente, voici les principaux changements
item.description: Microsoft a prévu une nouvelle mise à jour remplie de nouvelles fonctionnalités et correctifs en février. On vous détaille les principales nouveautés de ce prochain Patch Tuesday.

item.title: Ring brings its ‘Search Party’ feature for finding lost dogs to non-Ring camera owners
item.description: Ring's Search Party feature for finding lost dogs is now available across the U.S. — even if you don't own a Ring camera.

item.title: Les 10 smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid : Xiaomi surpasse Samsung
item.description: Pour notre top 10 des smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid, Xiaomi réussit pour l'une des premières fois de cet exercice a supplanter la toute puissance de Samsung.

item.title: Bientôt adieu Visa et Mastercard : la solution européenne de paiement arrive
item.description: L'EPI et Alliance EuroPA signent un accord majeur pour l'avenir du paiement en Europe. Une alternative à Visa et Mastercard qui sert déjà 130 millions d'utilisateurs.

item.title: Five AI agent predictions for 2026: The year enterprises stop waiting and start winning
item.description: 2026 is the year of operationalizing AI. Here are five predictions for how AI agents will reshape business in 2026.

item.title: MongoDB instances are being hit in data extortion attacks, so make sure you're protected
item.description: Hackers are hunting for vulnerable MongoDB servers and there are reportedly many to choose from.

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is back on sale for $299
item.description: Whether you're one of the few people still keeping up with New Year's resolutions or just want an upgraded smartwatch, now is a good time to get an Apple Watch. Currently, the Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299, down from $399. The 25 percent discount brings the 2025 model back down to its record-low price. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear. It also offers new health metrics, including Apple's hypertension alerts system and Sle...

item.title: The Epstein files
item.description: The Department of Justice has released more of its records on self-described “science philanthropist” and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. Other than Epstein, they’ve also brought an intense focus on the many powerful people who associated and corresponded with him, including Bill Gates, Elon Musk, Google co-founder Sergey Brin, and President Donald Trump. There’s also […]...

item.title: The future of agentic commerce: The role identity plays in hybrid experiences
item.description: Why seamless, secure identity defines the future of commerce.

item.title: Galaxy Watch Ultra 2 : Samsung confirme ses plans pour sa montre la plus massive de 2026
item.description: Alors que Samsung ne devrait pas présenter ses prochaines montres avant l'été prochain, les Galaxy Watch 9 et Galaxy Watch Ultra 2 ont déjà été certifiées par la GSMA.

item.title: Newegg just gave us an exclusive discount - here are 6 gaming laptops I'd recommend with Black Friday-level prices
item.description: Looking for a new gaming laptop? Newegg has just provided TechRadar readers a handy exclusive code to discount its RTX 5000 series machines even further this week.

item.title: Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85 hits Netflix on April 23
item.description: While the main series might be over, Netflix is far from done with Stranger Things. The first spin-off to hit the streaming service will be Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85. The company had said that the animated show would arrive sometime this year and now, alongside a new trailer, it confirmed a release date of April 23. The trailer is a bit of an odd watch given that Stranger Things wrapped up only a month ago. Going from that to this animated style with a whole new voice cast is jarring, but a fun gag at the end of the clip taps into certain misconceptions the audience might have.Stranger T...

item.title: Fin de l’IPTV sur Fire TV, Amazon bloque l’installation des APK
item.description: Amazon sonne la fin de la récréation pour les utilisateurs bidouilleurs de ses clés de streaming. Une mise à jour logicielle bloque désormais l'installation de certains fichiers APK, rendant le sideloading bien plus complexe sur les Fire TV.

item.title: ‘Scream 7’ Calls in Early With Its New Super Bowl Trailer
item.description: Ghostface is back and promising to make Sidney and her loved ones suffer again in the latest look at 'Scream 7'.

item.title: Docusign’s CEO on the dangers of trusting AI to read, and write, your contracts
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Allan Thygesen, who is the CEO of Docusign. You know Docusign; it’s the platform where you sign things online. It turns out 7,000 people work there, which is one of those facts you see flying around sometimes that’s always felt like perfect Decoder bait. What are all those people doing? And […]

item.title: Dragon Quest gets another great remake that’s perfect for newcomers
item.description: When a video game series goes on for a long time, it raises a question for newcomers: Just where is the best place to jump in? In the case of Dragon Quest, there are nearly a dozen mainline titles, not to mention copious spinoffs and ports that span four decades of history. Of late, though, […]

item.title: Carbon Robotics built an AI model that detects and identifies plants
item.description: Carbon Robotics' Large Plant Model will allow farmers to kill new types of weeds without having to retrain the machines.

item.title: Coalition demands federal Grok ban over nonconsensual sexual content
item.description: Nonprofits urge the U.S. government to suspend Grok in federal agencies after the xAI chatbot generated thousands of nonconsensual sexual images, raising national security and child safety concerns.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Tuesday, February 3 (game #1471)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Tuesday, February 3 (game #968)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Tuesday, February 3 (game #702)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined is so good you can't tell it's a remake of a game from more than twenty years ago
item.description: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined would be a perfect first-ever RPG, but is just as enjoyable if it's your 50th.

item.title: Honor Magic V5 : l’un des smartphones pliables les plus fins du monde est presque à moitié prix
item.description: Lancé l'an dernier, le Honor Magic V5 est un smartphone pliable au format « fold » qui n'a quasiment rien à envier au Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7. Il est surtout moins cher que son grand rival : pendant les soldes d'hiver, on le trouve à 1 189,99 euros au lieu de 1 999 euros chez Rakuten.

item.title: Windows 11 : Microsoft a mis un temps fou pour corriger un bug de connexion très embarrassant
item.description: Le bug qui masquait le bouton pour saisir le mot de passe de connexion à votre session Windows 11 est enfin résolu, six mois après sa découverte.

item.title: Apple revoit la façon d’acheter un MacBook pour vous faire payer plus cher
item.description: Sur son Apple Store, Apple a discrètement modifié le parcours d'achat pour un nouveau Mac, le calquant sur celui déjà en place pour l'iPhone ou l'iPad. Voyons ce que change cette nouvelle approche, très encadrée.

item.title: Google apporte une option essentielle à NotebookLM sur mobile
item.description: La firme de Mountain View a mis au point une fonctionnalité de résumé vidéo au sein de son outil de prise de notes par IA.

item.title: 13 000 milliards de dollars : Spotify et d’autres réclament une somme délirante à Anna’s Archive
item.description: Spotify et plusieurs labels musicaux portent plainte contre le site Anna's Archive. Ils demandent une compensation particulièrement salée.

item.title: 10 ans de mises à jour pour la Shield TV : Nvidia bat Google et Samsung à plate couture
item.description: À l'ère de l'obsolescence programmée, où changer de smartphone tous les deux ans est devenu la norme, un OVNI résiste encore et toujours : la Nvidia Shield TV. Sortie en 2015, cette box Android TV continue de recevoir des mises à jour, une décennie plus tard. Comment est-ce possible ? Un dirigeant de Nvidia livre les secrets de cette longévité hors-norme. ...

item.title: Sam Raimi Still Has Hope for a ‘Spider-Man 4’
item.description: Plus, a wild rumor about the direction of 'The Brave and the Bold'.

item.title: UpScrolled’s founder says the social network has zoomed past 2.5M users
item.description: Upscrolled founder said that the social network was launched six years ago and had 150,000 users until January

item.title: Meta expérimente un clavier virtuel plus proche du réel pour le Quest 3
item.description: Les utilisateurs de Quest 3 ont une raison supplémentaire de garder leurs casques sur la tête : un clavier virtuel et un touchpad qui se positionnent sur une surface plane, comme une table ou un bureau. Ce n'est pas exactement un « vrai » clavier physique, mais ce sera probablement mieux que le clavier virtuel actuel.

item.title: « Nous devons améliorer Windows » : pourquoi Microsoft pourrait s’inspirer d’Ubisoft et Square Enix pour sauver Windows 11
item.description: Dans la tourmente sur les soucis de stabilité de Windows 11, Microsoft annonce vouloir sauver les meubles pour regagner la confiance des utilisateurs. Une nouvelle stratégie qu'on a déjà observée à plusieurs reprises dans le monde du jeu vidéo.

item.title: Major health provider data breach may have affected thousands more people - over 700k now thought to have been hit
item.description: TriZetto Provider Solutions breach was spotted in October 2025 after hackers lurked for almost a year.

item.title: What to know about the notable VIPs named in the Epstein files, from Elon Musk to former Prince Andrew
item.description: Newly released documents from the DOJ mention the names of powerful people in tech and politics. From tech titans to Wall Street power brokers and foreign dignitaries, a who’s who of powerful men make appearances in the huge trove of documents released by the Justice Department in connection with its investigations of Jeffrey Epstein.All have denied having anything to do with his sexual abuse of girls and young women. Yet some of them maintained friendships with Epstein, or developed them anew, even after news stories made him widely known as an alleged abuser of young girls.None have been cha...

item.title: Linq raises $20M to enable AI assistants to live within messaging apps
item.description: Linq offers an API that lets companies offer their AI assistants via iMessage, RCS and SMS.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Grok is still undressing men
item.description: After weeks of flooding the internet with nonconsensual sexual deepfakes, X has finally reined in Elon Musk's rogue chatbot Grok. Musk claims Grok obeys local laws and refuses to produce anything illegal - except it hasn't and it can. My testing shows Grok still readily undresses men and is still churning out intimate images on […]

item.title: The latest iPad mini is $100 off right now
item.description: We've finally made it to February, but, with the ongoing long nights, you might want a pick-me-up to get you through the rest of winter. Take the Apple iPad mini with the A17 Pro chip, which is on sale for $400, down from $500. Its small size is perfect for cozying up on the couch or to use on your daily commute. Apple released this iPad mini in late 2024 and it was a solid update. We gave it an 83 in our review thanks to the power of its A17 Pro chip and that it comes with a minimum of 128GB of storage. The model currently on sale comes with 128GB, Wi-Fi and all four color options: Blue, Pur...

item.title: Ces 10 arnaques en ligne explosent à l’approche des Jeux olympiques d’hiver 2026
item.description: À la veille de l’ouverture des Jeux d’hiver de Milano Cortina, les cybercriminels sont en embuscade. Les pirates sont bien partis pour surfer sur l’énorme visibilité de l’événement pour piéger les internautes et les spectateurs sur place. En plus des faux sites de billets, de voyages ou d’emplois, les pirates misent sur des campagnes de phishing, des applications factices, des QR codes piégés et même des contenus dopés à l’IA ou des deepfakes. Les chercheurs d’ESET appellent les fans de sports à la plus grande vigilance....

item.title: Surfshark's new browser tool warns you about dangerous sites before you click
item.description: Surfshark has updated its browser extension with a new feature that flags malicious links in Google Search results, helping users avoid malware and phishing attempts before they even click.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things: Tales from ’85’ Trailer Takes You Back to Hawkins
item.description: Netflix brings the Hawkins gang and the Upside Down into animation with the new spinoff 'Stranger Things: Tales from '85'.

item.title: The 'most capable and best-looking mainline Apple Watch' is back to a record-low price on Amazon
item.description: The Apple Watch Series 11 is the best Apple Watch for most people, and it's just hit a record low once more on Amazon.

item.title: Now anyone can tap Ring doorbells to search for lost dogs
item.description: Ring is opening its Search Party pet finder service to non-Ring owners through the free Ring Neighbors app. The service has helped reunite owners with "more than one lost dog a day" since launch, according to the company. Anyone in the US can share a photo of their missing pet after they download and register […]

item.title: What is the release date for Fallout season 2 episode 8 on Prime Video?
item.description: It's finale week for Fallout season 2 – here's when you can watch its eighth episode.

item.title: Get up to 20 percent off Sonos home theater gear before Super Bowl 2026
item.description: It's big-game season, which means it's a good time to look for home theater gear on sale ahead of Super Bowl 2026. There are plenty of Super Bowl TV deals to consider, but if you have arguably the most important piece of the puzzle down, you may want to upgrade your sound system instead. Sonos' latest sale may have just what you need; a bunch of the company's home theater gear is up to 20 percent off right now. You can save $130 on the Beam (Gen 2) soundbar, bringing its price down to $369, and you'll also find deals on the flagship Arc Ultra soundbar, subwoofers, and more. The Sonos Beam is t...

item.title: La pleine Lune s’est dédoublée ? Ce spectacle irréel observé en Russie a affolé les réseaux sociaux !
item.description: À en croire les internautes russes, il y avait plusieurs lunes en même temps dans leur ciel ce week-end. Ils ont des images. Mais peut-on s’y fier ?

item.title: Cette tour PC Alienware avec près de 30 % de remise (RTX 5070, Ultra 7, 32 Go RAM) revient moins cher qu’un PC monté maison
item.description: Avec la pénurie des composants et la hausse des prix de la RAM et du stockage, cette tour Alienware affichée à près de 30 % de remise tombe à point nommé : avec sa RTX 5070, son Intel Ultra 7 et ses 32 Go de RAM, elle offre une configuration taillée pour le 1440p et la 4K à un tarif bien plus intéressant que le montage d’un PC équivalent.
